name: Froggily
description:
As a Frog try to fill your stomach by eating as many bugs as you can.

-Tap to shoot your tongue in tap direction
-Hold and release to jump
-When stomach full, click on it to make game go faster and get points multiplier

Developed for Ludum Dare 42 (theme: Running Out Of Space)

Developers:
Alberto Paparella (design and code),
Akusan (art),
Barmey Ung (main soundtrack),
Fabrizio Spadaro (code and art),
Pax Helgesen (sound design) [Twitter: @paxsonh]
